msbt.message: Would it even be December if I wasn't thinking about Toy Day constantly, ?What kinds of gifts do I get for all my friends? And what will they get me? Should I drop hints?Eeee! I can't say ANYthing else, because the surprise is the best part. You'll just have to waaaaait!

You know Toy Day is coming up soon, right? Do you already have wrapping paper and gifts ready?OK, don't panic if you don't! There's still time to worry about finding the perfect gifts for everyone.Oh, did I say "worry"? No, no. This is fun! This is what we live for! I'm not stressed. I'm psyched!
Have you seen the festive tree in the plaza yet? It is totes GLAM!Ooh! I know what the background for my next selfie is going to be
